title: Ukrainian military had 61 combat engagements with Russian forces near Terny of Donetsk region and Bilohorivka of Luhansk regi...
content: Ukrainian military had 61 combat engagements with Russian forces near Terny of Donetsk region and Bilohorivka of Luhansk region, Klischiyivka, Andriyivka of Donetsk region, Berdychi, Umanske, Tonenke, Pervomayske, Nevelske of Donetsk region, Krasnohorivka, Heorhiyivka, Novomykhaylivka, Vodyane of Donetsk region, Staromayorske of Donetsk region and north-west Verbove of Zaporizhzhia region, - General Staff of Armed Forces of Ukraine says in the evening report
author: Live UA Map
